entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
